abstract: The venture will focus on products that help the elderly and those with chronic diseases to live independently.
snippet: The venture will focus on products that help the elderly and those with chronic diseases to live independently.
lead_paragraph: General Electric and Intel said on Monday that they had formed a joint venture to create products for patients with chronic diseases and for elderly people at home or in assisted living.

headline.main: G.E. and Intel Form Health Venture
headline.print_headline: G.E. and Intel Form Health Venture
